pull.title: doc: Remove outdated net comment
pull.body: `mapAddresses` and the corresponding "critsect" has been removed in 5fee401fe14aa6459428a26a82f764db70a6a0b9 more than 6 years ago. Now is probably a good time to remove this confusing comment.
